          <title>
            <string language="sl">Računalništvo - navodilo za delo</string>
            <string language="en">Computer science - basic instructons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informatik - grundlegende instructons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Informatique - instructons de base</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informática de - instructons básicos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Informatica - instructons di base</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορική - βασικά instructons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Informática - instructons básicos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učna priprava za računalništvo na začetku šolskega leta (hišni red, gesla, ...).</string>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan for first hour of computer science class (using computer, order in classroom, passwords, ...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">navodilo</string>
            <string language="en">instruction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">računalnik</string>
            <string language="en">computer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">računalništvo</string>
            <string language="en">computer science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">začetek</string>
            <string language="en">beginning</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan erste Stunde lang der 
Informatikkategorie (Computer, Ordnung im Klassenzimmer, Kennwörter 
verwendend...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon pour la première heure du cours 
d'informatique (utilisant l'ordinateur, la commande dans la salle de 
classe, les mots de passe...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição para a primeira hora da classe 
da informática de (que usa o computador, a ordem na sala de aula, as 
senhas...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione per la prima ora del codice 
categoria di informatica (che usando calcolatore, ordine nell'aula, le
parole d'accesso...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος για την πρώτη ώρα της κλάσης 
πληροφορικής (που χρησιμοποιεί τον υπολογιστή, την κατάταξη στην 
τάξη, τους κωδικούς πρόσβασης...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan de la lección para la primera hora de la 
clase de la informática (que usa el ordenador, la orden en sala de 
clase, palabras de paso...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisung</string>
          </keyword>
